name: Woot Watcher Reloaded
author: Lee Thompson

sections.description:
This Sidebar widget will monitor and display products from Woot.com Kidswoot.com Winewoot.com Shirtwoot.com Sellout.com

Some of the features: * Automatically refresh for Woot Off * Select the woots you want to show * Compatible with WordPress (have not tested on BuddyPress or Mu) * Will work with any caching system.

If you have any problems with the plugins, please visit either [http://mysqlhow2.com/] or [http://poundbangwhack.com] for further information and provide some feedback first, we may be able to help. It’s considered rude to just give low ratings and nothing reason for doing so.

If you find this plugin useful and would like to say thanks, a link, digg, or some other form of recognition to the plugin page on our blog would be appreciated.

Please Donate for continued development: Donate
sections.installation:
1. Upload this plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and unzip it, or simply upload the zip file within your wordpress installation.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. If you want to add other woots go to the “Settings -> Woot Watcher” and select the ones to display.

  4. Add the “Woot Watcher” with ajax widget to your sidebar.

  5. Happy WOOTING!!
sections.faq:
Can I use light boxes?

Yes, it works with jquery lightbox or lightbox 2.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Initial Release

1.2

Added a bar graph for woot offs Added lights to all other woot during wott offs

1.3

Added CSS for better displaya

2.0

Fixed all the bugs so this can be used again.
